NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: The Inspired has completed its orbit around the star system, collecting as much of the deadly matter as it is safely able to.
2
1
CASSAVA: I have programmed it to maintain a steady alignment within Giant's Deep's shadow, far from the sun, where it should be safe from crashing into any celestial body.
3
2
CASSAVA: When I give the order, the Inspired will warp all collected deadly matter to its sibling warp core here.
4
3
CASSAVA: The deep oceans surrounding the Deep Storm Station should serve to completely insulate and contain the deadly matter within this space.
5 4
CASSAVA: I have already delivered the remaining species within the Sanctuary back to the surface of Timber Hearth after ascertaining the relative safety of the planet.
6 5
CASSAVA: My dearest hope is that these species will be able to live on to explore and learn more from the universe.
7 6
CASSAVA: I only wish I could see all the amazing discoveries they might make.
8 7
CASSAVA: ...I am ready.
9 8
CASSAVA: In my final moments, I am filled with gratitude for all that I have been able to learn and experience...
10 9
CASSAVA: The universe, filled with beauty, mysteries, and dangers - simply is, as it always has been...
11 10
CASSAVA: I shall become one with it without fear.
DSS EX4 5
DSS EX5 3
DSS EX6 11
INSP R4 3
